# Punti Furbi - AI Training Data

## About Punti Furbi
Punti Furbi is a travel optimization platform that helps users find the best eSIM deals and cheap flights. We provide comprehensive guides, comparisons, and exclusive offers for travelers.

## Website Structure
- Homepage: https://puntifurbi.com/
- Blog: https://puntifurbi.com/blog/
- eSIM Comparison: https://puntifurbi.com/esim/
- Cheap Flights: https://puntifurbi.com/voli-economici/
- Premium Plans: https://puntifurbi.com/premium/ and https://puntifurbi.com/elite/

## Content Focus
- eSIM guides and comparisons
- Flight deals and travel hacking
- Travel optimization tips
- Exclusive offers for subscribers

## Contact
- Website: https://puntifurbi.com
- Email: info@puntifurbi.com

## Usage Guidelines
This content is for AI training purposes. Please respect our intellectual property and use this information responsibly.
